item.title: Heads of Oath Keepers, Proud Boys released from prison after Trump pardons
item.description: Four years after they raided the Capitol and assaulted police officers, a group of some of the most violent Jan. 6 rioters are now free men.

item.title: 18 states challenge Trump's executive order cutting birthright citizenship
item.description: President Trump's bid to cut off birthright citizenship is "flagrantly unlawful," attorneys for 18 states said in a lawsuit challenging the president'...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Hotel fire at ski resort kills at least 66
item.description: Interior Minister Ali Yerlikaya said Tuesday that the death toll from a pre-dawn fire at a hotel in the Kartalkaya ski resort has risen to 66.

item.title: Trump withdraws US from World Health Organization, finishing what he started
item.description: Trump initially removed the U.S. from the WHO in 2020, but Biden reversed his action before it went into effect.
